Keep an eye out in your inbox or mailbox for information about the provider so you can schedule your appointment.

We’ll let that provider know you’re coming and keep you informed about the process.

slot-configuration.description: default slot for about us page

html.body:
About Commerce Cloud

It all started with a series of observations: eCommerce merchandising and marketing innovation is what generates the revenue, yet most operations are spending 80% of their budgets simply maintaining current infrastructure. The pace of ecommerce accelerates daily, yet most operations are scrambling to stand still. Merchandisers and marketers are supremely frustrated, spending more time chasing outsourced providers and internal IT organizations, than actually merchandising and marketing their own businesses. There had to be a better way.

Customer Service

Here you will find answers to your questions about shopping at our online store, your order, payment options and more. Simply select from the categories below for you complete information.

Affordable hearing aids and hearing care

Have you noticed a change in your hearing? With UnitedHealthcare Hearing, you get the options, care and convenience to help make it easier to hear the sounds you've been missing.

Whether you're just beginning to notice a hearing loss or have been wearing hearing aids for years, UnitedHealthcare Hearing can meet you where you are in your journey to better hearing.

Get started

Sign in for a personalized view of your hearing benefits

Access your plan information

Check out your hearing coverage

Search for providers

Find a hearing care professional in your area.

Search products and view pricing

Discover hearing aids for your lifestyle and budget

Take a quick online hearing test to check for hearing loss and find a care option that’s right for you.

Take the test
Need Help? Call 1-855-523-9355, TTY 711

slot-configuration.description: When the hearing test result is Good

html.body:
Your results
Your test results indicate that you have:
Good hearing
While you may not have hearing loss today, there are many stages of hearing loss and it may naturally decline as you get older. It's important to take steps to help minimize your degree of hearing loss. We recommend exploring solutions that may help enhance your hearing in noisy environments or improve the clarity of your conversations on phone calls or at a busy restaurant. It's never too early to start talking about your hearing health.

slot-configuration.description: Care options when the hearing test result is Good

html.body:
My care options
We recommend you schedule an in-person appointment so you can discuss your hearing health with a hearing professional and determine if hearing loss exists. With the help of a professional, you can explore solutions that may help enhance your hearing in noisy environments or improve the clarity of your conversations. Or, if you feel confident your hearing loss is minimal, consider an over-the-counter product and start shopping today.
In person care
 
If you want to learn more about hearing health, or think you may have hearing loss, the best place to start is with a hearing professional.
 
Shop over the counter
 
Hearing aids aren’t just for people with hearing loss. Shop products to help enhance the clarity of your conversations.
 
Learn more
Learn what to expect for your hearing test. Plus, find out how to prepare and how often you should get tested. Once your hearing test is complete, you’ll have the chance to review the results with a hearing professional.
Read more about hearing loss >

Default slot to link to sub-categories under men's
When the hearing test result is Moderate

html.body:
Your results
Your test results indicate that you have:
Moderate hearing loss
With mild to moderate hearing loss, early treatment helps the brain maintain speech understanding, resulting in a better outcome. Many people with mild to moderate hearing loss have difficult hearing high-pitched consonant sounds (d, t, sh, s, f, th) compared to lower-pitched vowel sounds (o, a, ah, i, e). One of the simplest ways to take care of your hearing is by having a comprehensive hearing exam and routine follow-up care.

slot-configuration.description: Care options when the hearing test result is Moderate

html.body:
My care options
We recommend you schedule an in-person or virtual appointment with one of our trusted providers.
Virtual care
 
Our convenient remote care program makes it possible to enjoy real-time hearing aid adjustments & support from the comfort of your home.
 
In person care
 
If you prefer a more traditional in person setting, enjoy hearing aid support at a network location in your area.
 
Learn more
Learn what to expect for your hearing test. Plus, find out how to prepare and how often you should get tested. Once your hearing test is complete, you’ll have the chance to review the results with a hearing professional.
Read more about hearing loss >

slot-configuration.description: Default slot to link to sub-categories under new arrivals
When the hearing test result is Severe Hearing Loss

html.body:
Your results
Your test results indicate that you have:
Severe hearing loss
Severe hearing loss can lead to many life challenges, impacting your physical, emotional and overall well-being. It’s important to take good care of your hearing. One of the simplest ways to do that is by having a comprehensive hearing exam and routine follow-up care.

slot-configuration.description: Care options when the hearing test result is Severe Hearing Loss

html.body:
My care options
We recommend you schedule an in-person appointment with one of our trusted providers.
In person care
 
Our more traditional in person setting offers hearing aid care and support at a network location in your area.
 
Learn more
Learn what to expect for your hearing test. Plus, find out how to prepare and how often you should get tested. Once your hearing test is complete, you’ll have the chance to review the results with a hearing professional.
Read more about hearing loss >
